item.title: HobbyNotebook / Shame Golf (+41)
item.description: Miniature Shame Golf is a game of painting your miniatures.

item.title: Hobby
item.description: I paint small plastic monsters and soldiers for fun. Shame Golf Finished Models Mortal Realms Magazine List Imperium Magazine Contents TTG Mods 3D Printing Notes YouTube Playlist I use a specific Instagram tag for the finished ones. I started calling them “band shots” since it was usually a group who had been painted at once all posed together. I’m also tracking my “shame golf” score and I’m doing … well?
